data.title: Shepherd on Canada losing to France, why coaching was an advantage for France and more
data.meta_description: TSN basketball analyst Jevohn Shepherd joins us to discuss Canada's loss to France in the Olympic men's basketball quarterfinal, why France's coaching was the difference, how France's experience was a factor, Jamal Murray not being himself and more.
data.text:
First Up: August 7th, 2024 - Hour 2

The second hour of First Up with Aaron Korolnek and Carlo Colaiacovo as we are joined by Ben Steiner of CBC sports to discuss the latest with the Olympics and Camryn Rogers winning gold. We also play BAANG or What and discuss Canada's loss to France

Steiner on Rogers and Katzberg winning gold in hammer throw, Ahmed crashing in 5000M and more

CBC Sports reporter Ben Steiner joins us to chat about Canada's success in hammer throw with Camryn Rogers and Ethan Katzberg both winning gold, if they will return in 2028, who the star of the Olympics has been so far, Moh Ahmed not making the 5000-metre final and more.

First Up: August 7th, 2024 - Hour 1

The first hour of First Up with Aaron Korolnek and Carlo Colaiacovo as we are joined by TSN MLB analyst Steve Phillips to discuss the Jays win over the Orioles. We also chat about Canada's loss to France at the Olympics

Phillips on if Jays chose the right catcher in Kirk, why Vladdy will get a 10-year deal and more

TSN MLB analyst Steve Phillips joins us to chat about what is important for the Jays as they head toward the end of the season, Alejandro Kirk starting to heat up, if the Jays chose the right catcher, if we will see Joey Votto this season, White Sox ending their losing streak and more.

OverDrive - August 6, 2024 - Hour 3

Join Bryan Hayes and Frank Corrado for Hour 3 on OverDrive! TSN Reporter Mark Masters joins to discuss the Maple Leafs' confidence level heading into the season, Easton Cowan's potential leap to the NHL and the National Bank Open headlines in Toronto and Montreal. Hayes and Frankie go around the sports world in Confirm or Deny and the FanDuel SportsBook.

Rautins on Canada Basketball's disappointing result, the team's missed opportunity and the officiating's calls

TSN Basketball Analyst Leo Rautins joined OverDrive to discuss Canada's men's national basketball team's disappointing result against France, the team's lack of size's impact to the team, Jamal Murray's struggles and potential injury, the roster's shooting issues in the matchup, the officiating's missed calls towards Canada, the outlook of the roster moving forward, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Victor Wembanyama's prominence and more.

Caley on Guerrero jr.’s hot streak, how Springer matches up against Rodriguez, and on the White Sox 21-game losing streak

Covers' senior betting analyst Andrew Caley joined the show to chat about betting on Guerrero Jr.'s hot streak. Caley breaks down how Springer matches up against Rodriguez and the White Sox's 21-game losing streak.

Gay on Canada’s loss to France at the Olympics, highlighting the non-NBA players on France, and on Murray’s performance at the Olympics

FIBA play-by-play commentator Carlan Gay joined the show to discuss Canada's disappointing loss to France at the Olympics. Gay puts some respect on the non-NBA players for France and he talks about Jamal Murray's Olympic performance.

Game Play: August 6, 2024 - Hour 2

In the second hour of Game Play, Matt Cauz and Producer Cam rank the "Top Haters in Sports" in the Tuesday Top-Five. Then Matt is joined by Covers betting analyst Andrew Caley to break down tonight's MLB betting slate.

Game Play: August 6, 2024 - Hour 1

In the first half hour of Game Play, Matt shares his reaction to Canada's loss to France in the Olympic men's basketball quarterfinal. Then Matt is joined by FIBA play-by-play commentator Carlan Gay to further recap Canada's loss to France at the Olympics.
